programme.title: Palermo-Milan One Way
programme.desc: During an interrogation, turncoat Marinn√† mentions the name of Turi Arcangelo Leofonte, nicknamed "the Mafia's accountant" because of his dealings with organized crime.

programme.title: Getaway of Love
programme.desc: Giuliana leads a normal life; she has been married for 10 years to Martino, a less-than-passionate husband more devoted to his employment than to her. One day two thugs break into the supermarket where she works. A handsome policeman, Leonardo, comes to stop the robbery. A boundless attraction arises between the two, which will lead them to extreme choices in order to stay together.

programme.title: Erotomania
programme.desc: Lawyer Persichetti is an executive of a major oil company. The man suffers from a neurosis that prevents him from having satisfying sexual relations with both his wife Ciccia and his young and uninhibited lover Claretta. In an attempt to recover, he relies on the care of a strange psychiatrist, but without much success.

programme.title: Poker in bed
programme.desc: Love, rivalry, and high-stakes games mix in a witty tale of ambition and seduction

programme.title: Miami Supercops
programme.desc: An ex-con returns to Miami after completing a seven-year sentence for thieving $20,000,000 and is murdered. Two FBI agents are then shipped to Miami to investigate the case under the guise of cops.

programme.title: The White, the Yellow, and the Black
programme.desc: In the 19th century, when the Japanese Emperor sends a gift pony to the US President it gets stolen and ransomed by Indians but Sheriff Gideon aided by an inept Japanese servant offers to deliver the ransom.

programme.title: Dead Uncle
programme.desc: Cristian, who has no job and no desire to find one, has only one way out: to retrieve the urine of a jaguar in the remote Apulian countryside to carry out a very dangerous mission.

programme.title: So Young, So Lovely, So Vicious...
programme.desc: Gloria Guida is the cheeky teenager Angela, daughter of the widower Dr. Batrucchi. When she meets her father's new companion, Irene, taken in dislike she attempts by various subterfuges to discredit her in the man's eyes. But Angela soon discovers a stain in Irene's past: lesbian tendencies and a stormy relationship with a high school teacher, leading the latter to suicide.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: After making his historic crossing of the Alps with elephants transporting supplies and troops, Hannibal marches on Rome in a war of revenge. The presence of Silvia, niece of Quintus Fabius Maximus, creates clashes in his camp.

programme.desc: Love, rivalry, and high-stakes games mix in a witty tale of ambition and seduction

programme.title: Miami Supercops
